Thanks for letting me know. Can you please tell me more about these minimal pesticides that you use - which pesticides specifically and how are they applied? Additionally, how much longer will these apples last before going bad? Also, do you have any other apple varieties available with less pronounced ripeness or any cosmetic damage? Thanks.
